title: What is the most inhumane criminal act a single person can ever do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Molest a child. It's worse than murder because it is going to heavily impact their entire life. Someone who is dead doesn't mind as they don't know they are dead. Those in the sex industry are almost always a victim of molesting. On top of which, it perpetuates the cycle as those who molest were often victims themselves. There's no cure for this. If they can't control themselves and do it once, they WILL do it again. They don't need to be locked up, they need to be extinguished.
Since this is no doubt a most serious question, I will answer in the same fashion. Putting nutmeg in apple pie.
